title: A European Commission Perspective
segmentation: Well, thank you.
Thank you very much for this too long introduction.
You know you could make it very much, much shorter.
Well, I'm very happy to be to be here today to give you, in fact, a snapshot of what we are trying to develop in European Union with respect to.
While what I called the start of a kind of common framework when we speak about road map.
Yesterday we had a very interesting discussions during 2 hours with people about, well, some exchanges of views on road map for standardization.
And in fact, what what came across as the first first recommendations was that we need a common framework.

We need, in fact, before speaking about sequence between research, for example, research, Workshop agreement, standouts into on, we need to have a hook and we need to have a very strong sex framework.

What I will present you today is actually what we are trying to develop since 2 years with respect to better coordination for sharing information and in a way I would call that put the card on the table.
You know when you are playing.
